name: Cold Contract (2018, discontinued)
description:
Darren Coen, an ex military has been struggling for years now. He was able to survive by doing the dirty work for some shady underground criminals.

But eventually the contracts ceased and alcohol was his last thing to fill his time with. But some day he found a letter under his door - inside a contract with 20 grand in cash.

Mission is to whipe out an illegal organ trafficking ring.

COLD CONTRACT - was one of my first shooter Projects.

It contained 4 levels until I decided to discontinue the development.

The Project was cancelled in 2018. It will not be worked on anymore.

The Original Gamefiles are also lost.

Seing  the game after many years was very cool tho . Hope you enjoy this piece of my personal gamedev history.
